txt.en: 'We made it back before we were overrun! Great work as always, [placeholder]. Go report our success to Commander Glóin!'
TBD Mission Narrative 3
The mission is complete!\n\nYou should talk to Ausma in Annâk-khurfu.
The mission is complete!\n\nYou should report your success to Glóin in Annâk-khurfu.
Mission: Attack on the Armoury

You tell Glóin of your successful attack on the armoury.\n\n'That sounds rather harrowing, [placeholder]! I am impressed! Ausma has proven quite capable as well, but I am beginning to grow concerned that her plans are too reckless. It would not do to lose either of you, so take some care and temper Ausma's brashness with some caution! For now, go and get some rest. I will call upon you again soon.'
Shared Corruption
Talk to Ausma
Complete Mission: Attack on the Armoury
TBD
The main stockpile of Orkish weapons and armour has been found, but you must act swiftly before it can be moved.
Dâr Brulku, a fort near Gundabad, holds the Orcs' main stockpile of weapons and armour....\n\nYour mission is to infiltrate Dâr Brulku with Ausma and destroy the weapons and armour within.
TBD
Talk to Glóin
TBD Report to Scoutmaster
TBD
Talk to Ausma
Monsters in this mission will apply a corruption buff to nearby allies.
TBD Let's get scouting!

'Ready for work, [placeholder]? We've had a lucky find!'

She points to an exterior fort near the main gate of Gundabad.

'This is Dâr Brulku. This fort holds the Orcs' main stockpile of weapons and armour. From it they arm their raiding parties and the guards that defend the gates. They know a battle is coming, however, and have begun to move the stockpile into Gundabad itself. If the two of us sneak past enemy lines and infiltrate that fort before they can move the stockpile, we can destroy it before they even realize what happened!

'We shouldn't wait too long, or we will miss this chance. We will need the cover of darkness to make it that far. Meet me here tonight.'
You have been assigned another important mission!\n\nReport to Ausma in Annâk-khurfu to learn the details.

'[placeholder], for your continued effort, I grant you the rank of Izkhas of the Gabil'akkâ! It is well earned, my friend!\n\n'There is little time to celebrate, however. I have another important mission for you. Our scouts have discovered the location of the Orcs' main armoury outside of Gundabad. It seems to be their main base for waging more extensive war in the region, but we fear they may soon move their weapon and armour stockpiles into Gundabad itself, preparing for a siege. We have an opportunity to prevent that from happening! Report to Ausma as soon as you can.'
Your mission is to infiltrate Dâr Brulku with Ausma and destroy the weapons and armour within.\n\nTalk to Ausma to travel to Dâr Brulku.
